mean_cn: n.防卫者，拥护者，辩护者，【运动】卫冕者
mean_en: a player who must stop the other team from scoring in games such as football (soccer ), hockey, etc.; a person who defends and believes in protecting something
sentence: This knight is the defender of the King's treasure.
sentence_trans: 这个骑士是国王的宝藏的守护者。
word_etyma: de否定，相反 + fend=strike，表示“打击” + er[名词后缀]，行为的主动者 → defender防卫者，拥护者
